data.comment: Today's referee, Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima, has blown to start the match.
Bahia to take a throw-in in Vasco da Gama territory.
In the minute 1, In Salvador a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Bahia have been awarded a corner by Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama in their own half.
In the minute 4, Ball safe as Bahia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Gregore of Bahia smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Free kick Bahia.
In the minute 7, Vasco da Gama's Vinicius has run offside.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a Vasco da Gama throw-in in Bahia's half.
In Salvador Vasco da Gama attack through Marcos Junior. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 8, Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima awards Bahia a goal kick.
Vasco da Gama awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Vasco da Gama.
In the minute 10, Goal kick for Vasco da Gama at Arena Fonte Nova.
Goal! Rossi gives Bahia a 1-0 lead.
That's a fine assist from Clayson.
In the minute 12, Throw-in Bahia.
Throw-in for Bahia in the half of Vasco da Gama.
Free kick for Bahia in the half of Vasco da Gama.
In the minute 14, Corner awarded to Bahia.
Lucas Fonseca (Bahia) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Ball goes out of play for a Vasco da Gama goal kick.
In the minute 15, Throw-in for Vasco da Gama at Arena Fonte Nova.
Vasco da Gama have a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Salvador.
In the minute 17, Clayson is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Free kick for Bahia in their own half.
Clayson is back on the pitch.
In the minute 20, Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a free kick to Bahia.
Henrique Silva (Vasco da Gama) has received a first yellow card.
Free kick Bahia.
In the minute 22, Juninho Capixaba (Bahia) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima awards Vasco da Gama a goal kick.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama in their own half.
In the minute 23, Can Vasco da Gama get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bahia's half?
Vasco da Gama have been awarded a corner by Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima.
Bahia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 24, Free kick for Bahia in their own half.
Vasco da Gama awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 26, It's a goal kick for the home team in Salvador.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a Bahia throw-in in Vasco da Gama's half.
Free kick for Vasco da Gama in the half of Bahia.
In the minute 28, Goal kick for Vasco da Gama at Arena Fonte Nova.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Ricardo Graca for Vasco da Gama who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
It seems as if Ricardo Graca is unable to continue. Miranda replaces him for the away team.
In the minute 30, Can Bahia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Vasco da Gama's half?
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama in their own half.
In Salvador a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 32, Goal! Bahia extend their lead to 2-0 through Gilberto.
Ernando instrumental with a fine assist.
Corner awarded to Vasco da Gama.
In the minute 34, Bahia's Juninho gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Vasco da Gama have a goal kick.
Rossi is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 36, Free kick for Bahia in their own half.
Vasco da Gama awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Bahia in their own half.
In the minute 40, Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a throw-in for Vasco da Gama, close to Bahia's area.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Bahia in their own half.
In the minute 42, Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a free kick to Bahia in their own half.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Bruno Gomes.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Gregore for Bahia who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Daniel returns to the field for Bahia after picking up a slight injury.
Bahiaâ€™s Gregore is on his feet again at Arena Fonte Nova.
In the minute 45, Bruno Gomes for Vasco da Gama is back on the field again.
Bahia's Rossi looks ok and returns to the pitch.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Bahia awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Vasco da Gama pushes forward through Marcos Junior, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 45, Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima awards the away team a throw-in.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 45, Bruno Gomes (Vasco da Gama) gets booked by Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima, and will miss the next match due to the number of yellow cards received this season.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Salvador to check on Daniel, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 45, Goal! Clayson extends Bahia's lead to 3-0.
Bahia's Gregore has been booked in Salvador.
The second-half has started.
In the minute 46, Bahia push upfield and Gilberto gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Vasco da Gama defence.
In the minute 46, Vasco da Gama make their second substitution with Cayo Tenorio replacing Vinicius.
The away team replace Marcos Junior with Carlinhos.
Gabriel Pec is on a sub for Talles Magno for Vasco da Gama.
Vasco da Gama to take a throw-in in Bahia territory.
Vasco da Gama's German Cano breaks free at Arena Fonte Nova. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 49, Ball goes out of play for a Bahia goal kick.
Bahia have been awarded a corner by Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima.
Bahia drive upfield and Rossi gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Vasco da Gama defender.
In the minute 50, Throw-in for Vasco da Gama in the half of Bahia.
Douglas Friedrich is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Bahia's Douglas Friedrich is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 53, Carlinhos for Vasco da Gama gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima awards Bahia a goal kick.
Vasco da Gama awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 54, Bruno Gomes (Vasco da Gama) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Can Vasco da Gama get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bahia's half?
Vasco da Gama have been awarded a corner by Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima.
In the minute 55, Throw-in Vasco da Gama.
Vasco da Gama are in shooting range from this free kick.
Rossi for Bahia has been booked by Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 58, It's a goal kick for the away team in Salvador.
In Salvador Vasco da Gama attack through Fellipe Bastos. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Bahia goal kick.
In the minute 60, Corner awarded to Bahia.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Goal kick for Bahia at Arena Fonte Nova.
In the minute 62, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Vasco da Gama to take a throw-in in Bahia territory.
In the minute 64, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Vasco da Gama close to the penalty box.
Vasco da Gama attack but Gabriel Pec's header doesn't find the target.
Bahia have a goal kick.
In the minute 65, Elber is replacing Rossi for the home team.
Claudio Prates (Bahia) is making a second substitution, with Ronaldo replacing Daniel.
Vasco da Gama awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 67, Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a free kick to Bahia.
He's off! Bruno Gomes is shown a second yellow card.
In Salvador, Gilberto of Bahia is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 69, Throw-in for Vasco da Gama at Arena Fonte Nova.
Ramon is replacing Gregore for Bahia at Arena Fonte Nova.
Free kick for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
In the minute 73, Bahia's Ramon gets in a shot on goal at Arena Fonte Nova. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In Salvador a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ramon (Bahia) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 76, Saldanha is on a sub for Gilberto for Bahia.
Fessin is replacing Clayson for the home team.
Ball safe as Bahia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 77, Ball safe as Bahia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a free kick to Bahia.
In the minute 78, Throw-in Vasco da Gama.
Gabriel Pec is booked for the away team.
Free kick for Bahia in their own half.
Vasco da Gama awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 83, Vasco da Gama make their fifth substitution with Ygor Catatau replacing German Cano.
Throw-in for Bahia at Arena Fonte Nova.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 88, Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Throw-in for Vasco da Gama in the half of Bahia.
Vasco da Gama awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a Vasco da Gama throw-in in Bahia's half.
The fourth official's board shows 4 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Corner awarded to Vasco da Gama.
Throw-in for Vasco da Gama in the half of Bahia.
Throw-in for Bahia in their own half.
Vasco da Gama are coming forward and Ygor Catatau gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Vasco da Gama have been awarded a corner by Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima.
The match has come to a close in Salvador. The final score is 3-0.
